title: Three New Tours in Chiang Mai Announced by Cycling Tour Specialist Grasshopper Adventures
text:
Three New Tours in Chiang Mai Announced by Cycling Tour Specialist Grasshopper Adventures
Grasshopper Adventures opens a new shop in Chiang Mai, Thailand and launches its first three Chiang Mai cycling tours.
Chiang Mai, Thailand, October 15, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Chiang Mai is a firm favourite with travellers, with its many fascinating temples, lively night markets and great range of accommodation and restaurants. Grasshopper Adventures, whose cycling tours are rated as the number 1 Outdoor Activity in Bangkok, have now opened a new branch in Chiang Mai and have launched three new cycling day tours to explore the city.
‘Charming Chiang Mai’ is a full day tour visiting many of the city’s highlights including the Navel of the City, Wat Chiang Man, Wat Chedi Luang and the Worarot Market. A delicious local lunch is included in the tour along with Grasshopper’s usual high quality bikes (with helmets and water bottles), guides and snacks. The 14km ride is easy and relaxed with most of the distance being covered on back road and alleys, making this an idea tour for families with young children.
‘Bike Historic Old City Chiang Mai’ is a shorter, half day version of ‘Charming Chiang Mai’ covering highlights within the old city walls. 11km in length the tour is also suitable for children.
While Chiang Mai has a range of bike tours, and a variety of food tours, until now there hasn’t been a food tour by bike on offer. The new ‘Chiang Mai Food Adventures by Bike’ fills this gap with a half day evening ride taking cyclists on a tour de force of Chiang Mai’s street food, juice stalls and markets. Experience not only traditional Chaing Mai cuisine, known as Muang Food, but also sample Shan and Tai Yai delicacies. With some historical sites of interest thrown in this tour has something for everyone, vegetarians included. As much of this tour is at night, it is not suitable for kids riding alone, however child seats and tag-alongs are available.
Tour Info
Charming Chiang Mai:
Departs daily at 09:00
1,300 Thai Baht per person
Distance: 14km
Bike Historic Old City Chiang Mai:
Departs daily at 09:30
950 Thai Baht per person
Distance: 11km
Chiang Mai Food Adventures by Bike:
Departs daily at 17:30
1,650 Thai Baht per person
Distance: 12km
